chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (w k : nat) (t : my_term), lift w k (MyVAbs t) = MyVAbs (lift w (1 + k) t)

Premises:
lift = fun (T : Type) (Lift0 : Lift T) => let (lift) := Lift0 in lift : forall T : Type, Lift T -> nat -> nat -> T -> T Arguments lift {T}%type_scope {Lift} (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive my_term : Set := MyTValue : my_value -> my_term | MyTApp : my_term -> my_term -> my_term with my_value : Set := MyVVar : nat -> my_value | MyVAbs : my_term -> my_value Arguments MyVVar _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
pun_pun : forall (v : my_value) (w k : nat) (t : my_term), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)
Record PunPun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_PunPun { pun_pun : forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments PunPun {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_PunPun [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_PunPun : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T), subst v (w + k) (lift w k t) = subst v k (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> PunPun
lift_subst : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)
expand_lift : forall (w k : nat) (t : my_term), lift w k t = traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t
lift_subst_2 : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)
Record LiftSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst { lift_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (lift w (1 + k) s) (lift w (shift s k) t)) -> LiftSubst
Record LiftSubst2 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst2 { lift_subst_2 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t) } Arguments LiftSubst2 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst2 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftSubst2 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), s <= k -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) s (lift w (1 + k) t)) -> LiftSubst2
lift_subst_1 : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)
LiftSubst2_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) (H2 H3 : TraverseRelative) (H4 H5 : TraverseFunctorial) (H6 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) => {| lift_subst_2 := fun (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat) (H7 : s <= k) => eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => t0 = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 (lift w k v)) (l + s) x) 0 (traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + (1 + k)) x)) 0 t)) (eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => traverse (fun l x : nat => traverse (fun l0 x0 : nat => var (lift w (l0 + k) x0))...
Record LiftSubst1 (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_LiftSubst1 { lift_subst_1 : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t) } Arguments LiftSubst1 {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0 H1} Arguments Build_LiftSubst1 [V]%type_scope _ [T]%type_scope _ _ _%function_scope
Build_LiftSubst1 : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (T : Type) (H0 : Lift T) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat), k <= s -> lift w k (subst v s t) = subst (lift w k v) (w + s) (lift w k t)) -> LiftSubst1
LiftInjective_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) (H1 : TraverseVarInjective) => {| lift_injective := fun (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T) (H2 : traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t1 = traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t2) => traverse_var_injective (fun l x : nat => lift w (l + k) x) (fun (x1 x2 l : nat) (H3 : lift w (l + k) x1 = lift w (l + k) x2) => lift_injective w (l + k) x1 x2 H3) t1 t2 0 H2 |} : forall (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T...
PunPun_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) (H2 : TraverseRelative) (H3 : TraverseFunctorial) (H4 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) => {| pun_pun := fun (v : V) (w k : nat) (t : T) => eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => t0 = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 v) (l + k) x) 0 (traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + (1 + k)) x)) 0 t)) (eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => traverse (fun l x : nat => traverse (fun l0 x0 : nat => subst_idx (lift l0 0 v) (l0 + (w + k)) x0) l (var (lift w (l + k) x))) 0...
LiftInjective_idx = {| lift_injective := fun (w k t1 t2 : nat) (H : (if Compare_dec.le_gt_dec k t1 then w + t1 else t1) = (if Compare_dec.le_gt_dec k t2 then w + t2 else t2)) => match Compare_dec.le_gt_dec k t1 as s return ((if s then w + t1 else t1) = (if Compare_dec.le_gt_dec k t2 then w + t2 else t2) -> t1 = t2) with | left H0 => match Compare_dec.le_gt_dec k t2 as s return (w + t1 = (if s then w + t2 else t2) -> t1 = t2) with | left _ => fun H1 : w + t1 = w + t2 => (fun lemma : (fun t : BinNums.Z => t1 = t2 <-> t = BinInt.Z.of_nat t2) (BinInt.Z.of_nat t1) => Morphisms.iff_flip_impl...
subst_subst : forall (t : my_term) (k : nat) (v : my_value) (s : nat) (w : my_value), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)
LiftSubst1_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (H0 : Traverse V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Traverse V T) (H2 H3 : TraverseRelative) (H4 H5 : TraverseFunctorial) (H6 : TraverseIdentifiesVar) => {| lift_subst_1 := fun (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s w : nat) (H7 : k <= s) => eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => t0 = traverse (fun l x : nat => subst_idx (lift l 0 (lift w k v)) (l + (w + s)) x) 0 (traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t)) (eq_ind_r (fun t0 : T => traverse (fun l x : nat => traverse (fun l0 x0 : nat => var (lift w (l0 + k) x0))...
recognize_lift : TraverseRelative -> forall (w k1 k2 : nat) (t : my_term) (traverse_ : (nat -> nat -> my_value) -> nat -> my_term -> my_term), traverse_ = traverse -> traverse_ (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k2) x)) k1 t = lift w (k1 + k2) t
Record SubstSubst (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T) : Prop := Build_SubstSubst { subst_subst : forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t) } Arguments SubstSubst {V}%type_scope {H H0} {T}%type_scope {H1} Arguments Build_SubstSubst [V]%type_scope _ _ [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
Build_SubstSubst : forall (V : Type) (H : Lift V) (H0 : Subst V V) (T : Type) (H1 : Subst V T), (forall (t : T) (k : nat) (v : V) (s : nat) (w : V), k <= s -> subst v s (subst w k t) = subst (subst v s w) k (subst (shift k v) (1 + s) t)) -> SubstSubst
Lift_Traverse = fun (V : Type) (H : Var V) (T : Type) (H0 : Traverse V T) => {| lift := fun (w k : nat) (t : T) => traverse (fun l x : nat => var (lift w (l + k) x)) 0 t |} : forall V : Type, Var V -> forall T : Type, Traverse V T -> Lift T Arguments Lift_Traverse {V}%type_scope {H} {T}%type_scope {H0}
Build_LiftInjective : forall (T : Type) (H : Lift T), (forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2) -> LiftInjective
Record LiftInjective (T : Type) (H : Lift T) : Prop := Build_LiftInjective { lift_injective : forall (w k : nat) (t1 t2 : T), lift w k t1 = lift w k t2 -> t1 = t2 } Arguments LiftInjective {T}%type_scope {H} Arguments Build_LiftInjective [T]%type_scope _ _%function_scope

```coq
intros w k t.
unfold lift.
rewrite expand_lift.
simpl.
rewrite lift_subst.
rewrite <- pun_pun.
rewrite lift_subst_1.
auto.
Qed.```

original: intros w k t. unfold lift. rewrite expand_lift. simpl. rewrite lift_subst. rewrite <- pun_pun. rewrite lift_subst_1. auto.
